name: LGND (Demo)
description:
Using a pistol, a grappling hook and a tiny bit of broken physics, can you reach the end*?

*this is a demo, there is no end yet

LGND is a FPS Shooter/Platformer that uses physics, both realistic and broken, to provide an enjoyable experience. As of now, all you can really do is shoot blocks and swing around but I am looking to adding more features in the near future.

If you have time and feel like doing so, feedback would be appreiated
